slide1.title: Premium Workspaces for Modern Professionals
slide1.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Work Environment at SUKOON
slide1.description: Join a community of ambitious freelancers and students in beautifully designed workspaces equipped with everything you need to succeed.

slide2.title: Flexible Solutions for Every Need
slide2.subtitle: From Hot Desks to Private Offices
slide2.description: Whether you need a quiet corner for focused work or a collaborative space for team projects, SUKOON has the perfect solution for you.

slide3.title: Community-Driven Innovation
slide3.subtitle: Network, Collaborate, and Grow Together
slide3.description: Connect with like-minded professionals, attend exclusive events, and be part of a thriving community that supports your success.

haveItYourWay.title: Have It Your Way
haveItYourWay.subtitle: Customize your workspace experience with flexible options designed around your unique needs and working style.

features.title: Flexible Hours
features.description: Access your workspace 24/7 with our flexible membership plans. Work when inspiration strikes.

features.title: Community Events
features.description: Join networking events, workshops, and social gatherings to expand your professional network.

features.title: Premium Amenities
features.description: Enjoy high-speed internet, premium coffee, printing services, and modern meeting rooms.

spacesForOccasion.title: Spaces for Any Occasion
spacesForOccasion.subtitle: From quiet focus areas to collaborative meeting rooms, find the perfect space for every type of work.

spaces.title: Open Workspace
spaces.description: Dynamic open areas perfect for collaboration and networking. Enjoy the energy of a bustling workspace while maintaining your productivity.

spaces.title: Private Offices
spaces.description: Dedicated private spaces for teams and individuals who need focused, uninterrupted work environments.

spaces.title: Meeting Rooms
spaces.description: Professional meeting spaces equipped with the latest technology for presentations, video calls, and team collaborations.

facilities.title: ENJOY ALL THE FACILITIES
facilities.subtitle: Everything you need to work productively and comfortably, all included in your membership.

items.title: Phone Booths
items.description: Private phone booths for confidential calls

items.title: Quiet Zones
items.description: Dedicated quiet areas for focused work

additional.title: Event Spaces
additional.description: Host workshops, presentations, and networking events in our flexible event spaces.

additional.title: Community Lounge
additional.description: Relax and network in our comfortable community lounge with games and entertainment.

additional.title: Concierge Service
additional.description: Personal assistance with mail handling, package delivery, and administrative support.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to join our community? Contact us today to schedule a tour or learn more about our membership options.
